sources.name: SQLDB_table
sources.script:
source(output(
		{Service Vendor} as string,
		{Line of business} as string,
		PO as string,
		SKU as string,
		Quantity as integer,
		{Serial Number} as string,
		{CVE SKU} as string,
		{OEM SKU} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table') ~> SQLDB_table

sinks.name: sink1
sinks.script:
SQLDB_table sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	partitionFileNames:['finalresult'],
	truncate:true) ~> sink1
